title: Can't buy Camille
body: I just played against a Camille in Flex Rankex, but I can't buy her to play her?  I don't understand.

replies.body: I don't see any issues with unlocking Camille.  I recommend relogging just in case the store isn't updating for you.  Let me know if your issue persists!
I guess the problem was I was trying to purchase her through the collection interface.  When I went through the shop menus, i was able to purchase her.
On the same boat, can't buy her!
Yeah same. i have 8208 ip and it just says "Not enough ip/rp"  and it wont allow me to purchase her.  Bugged?
Also it says that her unlock feature has not yet been implemented?
It also doesnt matter how many times i relog, she isn't available for purchase.
i have more than enough ip but i cant buy her either
